mdRecord.dcterms:title: Anti-human serum
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ortho Pharmaceutical Corporation [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Empty clear glass bottle with black and white rubber cap, and liquid dispense attached. Label Information: Anti-Human Serum 5cc. for Coombs Test. Expiration date 1959-09-24. By the Ortho Pharmaceudical Corporation, Raritan, New Jersey.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
